item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Allure Logo Allure is an American women’s magazine focused on beauty, published monthly by Condé Nast in New York City. It was founded in 1991 by Linda Wells. Michelle Lee replaced Wells in 2015. A signature of the magazine is its annual Best of Beauty awards—accolades given in the October issue to beauty products deemed the best by Allure’s staff. Source
You can download theAllurelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Allure
item.description: Allure is an American women’s magazine focused on beauty, published monthly by Condé Nast in New York City. It was founded in 1991 by Linda Wells. Michelle Lee replaced Wells in 2015. A signature of the magazine is its annual Best of Beauty awards—accolades given in the October issue to beauty products deemed the best by Allure’s staff. Source
